item.title: ShinyHunters behind Salesforce data theft attacks at Qantas, Allianz Life, and LVMH
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: A wave of data breaches impacting companies like Qantas, Allianz Life, LVMH, and Adidas has been linked to the ShinyHunters extortion group, which has been using voice phishing attacks to steal data from Salesforce CRM instances. [...]

item.title: Hackers target Python devs in phishing attacks using fake PyPI site
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The Python Software Foundation warned users this week that threat actors are trying to steal their credentials in phishing attacks using a fake Python Package Index (PyPI) website. [...]

item.title: SafePay ransomware threatens to leak 3.5TB of Ingram Micro data
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The SafePay ransomware gang is threatening to leak 3.5TB of data belonging to IT giant Ingram Micro, allegedly stolen from the company's compromised systems earlier this month. [...]

item.title: Hackers actively exploit critical RCE in WordPress Alone theme
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Threat actors are actively exploiting a critical unauthenticated arbitrary file upload vulnerability in the WordPress theme 'Alone,' to achieve remote code execution and perform a full site takeover. [...]

item.title: Hackers plant 4G Raspberry Pi on bank network in failed ATM heist
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The UNC2891 hacking group, also known as LightBasin, used a 4G-equipped Raspberry Pi hidden in a bank's network to bypass security defenses in a newly discovered attack. [...]

item.title: Apple patches security flaw exploited in Chrome zero-day attacks
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Apple has released security updates to address a high-severity vulnerability that has been exploited in zero-day attacks targeting Google Chrome users. [...]

item.title: New Lenovo UEFI firmware updates fix Secure Boot bypass flaws
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Lenovo is warning about high-severity BIOS flaws that could allow attackers to potentially bypass Secure Boot in all-in-one desktop PC models that use customized Insyde UEFI (Unified Extensible Firmware Interface). [...]

item.title: AI Cuts vCISO Workload by 68% as Demand Skyrockets, New Report Finds
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by Cynomi
item.description: AI is reshaping vCISO services—and SMBs are fueling the surge. Cynomi's 2025 report shows 3x adoption growth and major workload drops as MSPs and MSSPs scale cybersecurity like never before. Learn more in the 2025 State of the vCISO Report. [...]

item.title: Minnesota activates National Guard after St. Paul cyberattack
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz has activated the National Guard in response to a crippling cyberattack that struck the City of Saint Paul, the state's capital, on Friday. [...]

item.title: Russian airline Aeroflot grounds dozens of flights after cyberattack
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Aeroflot, Russia's flag carrier, has suffered a cyberattack that resulted in the cancellation of more than 60 flights and severe delays on additional flights. [...]

item.title: Hackers exploit SAP NetWeaver bug to deploy Linux Auto-Color malware
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Hackers were spotted exploiting a critical SAP NetWeaver vulnerability tracked as CVE-2025-31324 to deploy the Auto-Color Linux malware in a cyberattack on a U.S.-based chemicals company. [...]

item.title: Microsoft Edge now an 'AI-powered browser' with Copilot Mode
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has introduced Copilot Mode, an experimental feature designed to transform Microsoft Edge into a web browser powered by artificial intelligence (AI). [...]

item.title: French telecom giant Orange discloses cyberattack
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Orange, a French telecommunications company and one of the world's largest telecom operators, revealed that it detected a breached system on its network on Friday. [...]
